General.Name: Global X Funds
General.Description: The fund is an actively managed ETF advised by the Adviser and sub-advised by the Sub-Adviser that seeks to achieve its investment objective by investing, under normal circumstances, at least 80% of its net assets, plus any borrowings for investment purposes, measured at the time of purchase, in equity securities: (i) of issuers in emerging markets; and/or (ii) that are tied economically to emerging markets.
